mapper.select: select distinct parentType from itemType where parentType is not null

select count(*) from( select reviewNo, id,r.content,r.picture,i.image as itemPicture,i.title as itemTitle,height,weight,mySize,star,itemColor,itemSize,i.itemNo,replyContent from item i, review r,itemOption o where r.itemOptionNo = o.itemOptionNo and o.itemNo = i.itemNo ) where itemNo=#{itemNo, jdbcType=INTEGER }
select distinct(itemColor) from item i, itemOption o where i.itemNo = o.itemNo and i.itemNo =#{itemNo}
select itemSize from item i, itemOption o where i.itemNo = o.itemOptionNo and i.itemNo =#{itemNo} and o.itemColor = #{color}
select o.count from item i, itemOption o where i.itemNo = o.itemOptionNo and i.itemNo =#{itemNo} and o.itemColor = #{color} and o.itemSize = #{itemSize}
select distinct(subType) from itemType t, item i where t.parentType = i.type and t.parentType=#{parentType}
select type,parentType from itemType where parenttype=(select parenttype from itemtype where type=#{type}) or parenttype=#{type}
select COALESCE(parenttype,type) from itemtype where type = #{type}

select i.itemNo,o.itemOptionNo,image, title, description, content,price,salePrice,i.type,itemColor,itemSize,itemCount,t.parentType,reviewCount,orderCount from (select * from item where rownum>=#{sno} and rownum<=#{eno} ) i , itemOption o,itemType t,(select itemOptionNo,count(*) reviewCount from review group by(itemOptionNo)) r, (select itemOptionNo,count(*) orderCount from orderItem group by(itemOptionNo)) oi where i.type=t.type and i.itemNo = o.itemNo and o.itemOptionNo = r.itemOptionNo(+) and o.itemOptionNo = oi.itemOptionNo(+) and(t.type = #{type} or t.parentType=#{type}) order by #{orderby} desc
select i.itemNo, image, title, description, content, price,salePrice, type,itemOptionNo,itemColor,itemSize,itemCount from item i , itemOption o where i.itemNo = #{itemNo} and i.itemNo = o.itemNo
